thread.title: Easy D? Trump's bizarre tweet is anything but simple to decode | US news
thread.title_full: Easy D? Trump's bizarre tweet is anything but simple to decode | US news | The Guardian

author: Paul Owen
title: Easy D? Trump's bizarre tweet is anything but simple to decode | US news
text:
Much of America and the world awaits each of Donald Trump‚Äôs tweets with increasing anxiety, as he uses them to systematically undermine the separation of powers, attack companies he believes have damaged his family‚Äôs interests, and decree that any bad news about him is a lie (and that‚Äôs just in the past two days). Perhaps then, some on Twitter could be forgiven for taking a bit of time out on Wednesday to point and laugh at one of the more bizarre pronouncements to come from the White House pulpit since Trump took office.
Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) Big increase in traffic into our country from certain areas, while our people are far more vulnerable, as we wait for what should be EASY D!
February 8, 2017 In defence of Donald Trump‚Äôs Twitter diplomacy | Mary Dejevsky Read more 
Trump may have been referring to what he thinks should be an ‚Äúeasy D-cision‚Äù by the court currently deciding whether to keep in place a halt to his hugely controversial travel ban, which many view as xenophobic and unconstitutional. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs really incredible to me that we have a court case that‚Äôs going on so long,‚Äù Trump told a police conference in Washington earlier on Wednesday. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre interpreting things differently than probably 100% of the people in this room.‚Äù 
Then again, many of his Twitter followers speculated that he may have been referring to something else.
Amanda Marcotte (@AmandaMarcotte) Here we feminists thought Trump would do nothing for women, but it‚Äôs only week two and he‚Äôs tackling the national shortage of easy D.
February 8, 2017 Adrienne Bailey (@Schmaids) @realDonaldTrump Easy D must make @VP really uncomfortable.

(We know what you're thinking, but that's NSFW: https://t.co/vuZWDKqMFT )
